name: Blind Date 3D
description:
Noah’s best friends, Liam and Olivia, have just set him up for a night at their own home with an extra special guest: Maya, the newest and most promising model at Olivia’s agency. There’s just a slight complication: while Liam is his best mate and the co-owner of their marketing firm, he’s also Olivia’s husband, and Olivia is… the only woman for whom Noah has felt anything in a long, long time.
In an outburst of mutual weakness, they shared a moment, which became their secret and, since then, Noah has struggled not to act on the attraction both of them feel. So, this date could be a catalyst for something he has been dreading and desiring for a long time, or a way for Olivia to set him up with a younger girl and get him out of her radar. To sum it up: any uncertainty and anxiety one feels before a blind date has been, at the very least, squared.
- visual novel with immersive action and 3d visuals
- a lot of interactive choices - depending on your decisions this night might end up in many different ways
- building relations and discovering fetishes of party participants
- free walking and exploring secrets of your host apartment
High quality visuals
Enjoy the new strikingly detailed models, textures and lighting
Actors that play their roles
The natural facial expressions and body movement tell their story
Freedom during sex scenes
Be the director and run the show the way you like it
Pick out new clothes
Make the kind of party you would want to be in
So many fetishes, so little time
Cheating, swinging, partner-sharing, striptease, blindfolds, sex-tapes–there’s something for everyone… and for every girl
Noah
Age: 36
Occupation: co-owner of a marketing firm
Sexual experience: around 7 partners so far, no serious relationships
Desires: Olivia. Olivia, Olivia and Olivia. His best friend’s wife can’t stop running through his head, and it’s all Noah can do not to run after her. A date with a (hopefully) gorgeous model may be just what he needs to keep resisting the siren’s call - sure, he isn’t expecting true love to bloom from the bizarre situation, but hot, sweaty sex can work wonders as a distraction. The future can take care of itself.
Liam
Age: 38
Occupation: co-owner of a marketing firm
Sexual experience: Olivia is his true love, the one and only - except for the nearly fifty women that came before her
Desires: he is devoted to his wife and loves her as a soulmate. Still… Well, old habits die hard, and Liam still hopes for some of the wilder things he did before getting married.
Olivia
Age: 35
Occupation: owner of a model’s agency
Sexual experience: several serious relationships - no more than five partners
Desires: Liam is her true love. They understand each other on every level and she is sure that he is the one. Still... that night at the office with Noah... That made her realize that being with the same man for the rest of her life could be more challenging than she had believed. Especially when her husband’s best friend is a constant temptation.
Maya
Age: 23
Occupation: aspiring model
Sexual experience: unknown
Desires: Olivia was the one who tried to set her up for the whole blind date idea, and her husband went along with it, securing his best buddy’s attendance. Still, whether the girl is looking for love in all the wrong places (as Olivia hopes) or shrewdly securing a sponsor and future contractor (as Liam suspects) only time will tell.
Roam Liam and Olivia’s apartment for an evening and accompany your ravishing date, Maya while trying to seduce her… or ditch her for a passionate tryst with your host’s wife. There are a lot of choices, and the objects you pick up and the way you interact with them may be the key to a girl’s heart… or the best sex of your life.
And that's it, Noah - your blind date is over and done with. Did you manage and lure Maya into your hosts’ bed? Did you share a steamy moment out in the terrace? Or did you fall to temptation and made Olivia stumble with you? Although Olivia herself is not so innocent, Liam even less so, and temptation can be so easily shared... So many possibilities, so many choices - it’s a good thing you can go back and do it all again. So, what are you waiting for?
